column5: Pretty lucky too, I am blessed in as much as I have all and more than I could ever possible use.  No question that high on my wish list is for those of us who are facing challenges either themselves or their loved ones to have a wonderful holiday season filled with good health, joy and happiness.  Can't think of anything else that would give me as big a buzz as that.....

Mercman: im telling your wife that you want her to have a 20LB baby...... now you wont have to worry about xmas, you wont be here....LOL  as for the life jacket, they now make them for new born size and up.
Brian, thats a wonderful gesture.Warm soup works wonders to put a smile on a hungry face.I'm proud of you

There was a time I said WTH is this,cant get a job,stop making babies,but now of days,it,s not that.Im lucky enough to be able to give.   They need crackers to go with that soup.  God knows soup without crackers, is just water with noodles.LOL  That will be my next donation. Crackers.
Your a bad man....a very very bad man I'm getting lifejackets for my Lab and my Pom, and if they make them for newborns, i'll be in heaven !!!Now the dilema. What size of boat do i wish for
Not fishing but for fish....... I already have a custom steel stand that will hold two 180 gallon aquariums, but I need the tanks.... hope I can pick them up over Christmas!!  Burt
there is nothing I want that I cant buy...  what I want for Christmas is my mother to not die...
This is just about the nicest thing i've ever heard I'm sure hope someone is trying to make this wish come true for you.
The opportunity to see both my kids grow into healthy adults and realise their potential - whatever that maybe.

Peace and good health too all! For our children to grow up to their full potential and be happy! Thats what I wish for! I have what I need! 10 times over!  An ice ducer wouldnt hurt either! LOL Vexlar20?
gift cards!
Prayers from London

Yeah yeah yeah, I know,,, it's only mid November and Christmas is 6 weeks away.  However, I can't be the ONLY ONE who suspects others in the house may be watching OFC for some Christmas ideas for their significant other ( ME ! ) or some gift ideas to give to our other fishing family members.  So, in no particular order, here are my top three:  1) Depth finder with temperature and side view capabilities  2) Mr Buddy Heater  3) Ice fishing jigs    Now, how about all you OFC'ers?  What are the top three items you hope for for Christmas this year ?
I'm a lucky guy and have absolutely everything I need as far a fishing gear goes, infact I never bought a single piece of gear this year.
portable fish hut fishfinder with gps (downimaging or side would be sweet but too much$$) maybe a new auger.
Fishfinder/GPS and a Bow Mount for the filth deluxe
I'm a less than 5 minute walk to the marina here, would really like to have a fully rigged 20 to 22 foot walk around cuddy cabin fishing rig slipped there for next summer

i'd like a new muskie rod and reel.I'm gonna get me a muskie next season  I'm also hoping to trade my 14"er for a 16 with side console next year.The wife and i just went through IVF so looks like a bigger boat will be needed next season
Mercman, Good luck to both of you! p.s. You may have to wait to take the newborn on the new boat. Minimum weight for a PFD is 20 lbs. Regards, Pikeslayer
A 2 man clam an Aquaview camera.
Good karma and recovery for all 'survivors' here at OFC (and everywhere else for that matter). Pikeslayer
A 30# plus laker!!!!
Looks like we're shopping in the same store fella !
I have everything I need for fishing so I suppose that the continued health and happiness for me the wife and the little fella. Maybe a trail pass for the sled so I can use it twice :-).

My Gf had a great idea. Instead of buying expensive presents for each other, we buy each other 1 small inexpensive present just so we can say that we got each other something and with the rest of the cash we just buy toys and take them to a shelter or a red cross.
New spinning reel. The old abu has seen better days. Not very imaginative...
a trolling rod and line counter reel.  item 3, a bunch of new PB's
new flasher for ice fishing... humminbird ice 55, new reels quantum smoke PT casting reels.
ICE for simcoe opener.
a new 4x4 suv.......  if you all give till it hurts, it could happen     LOL
Thats all I want aswell. I got what I need,just need to use it.
This is just oh so wrong...
Already got my present!!!  Got a Canon 60D
^this.  And a variety of hardwater toys
Thanks Pikeslayer...Then i want a 20# baby !!!
I like this one The wife is knitting scarves and mittens for the local clothing drive, and we always donate at least 5-700$ worth of food to the local food bank.

Good on your wife and you aswell. Many need.  Myself today,didnt want to say, til you said something. Cambells has thier feed the hungry label on thier soup cans.49 cents a can. 49 cents.   I asked the store boy to grab 4 cases and come with me. Went through  the cash and walked up to the drop box. Said now,drop those can of chicken noodle soups in the food drive box. He said something I hate to hear,good for you SIR. I said dont call me sir. makes me feal old.LOL   Do what you can. Im sure this wont be my only drop in the box.
